WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has been fixed in the develop-0.9.x branch.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi, 

Here is the repro:

`var regex = /[a-z]$/i; // okay
var regex2 = /[a-z/]$/i; // // Error: Check format of expression term`
WorkItem.Summary: Forward slash regex literal breaks compiler

Comments.Message: Thank you for reporting this issue, I marked it active. We're going to take a look at this.
